job_tasks.phrase: maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of maintaining and improving existing workflows, which includes automation of processes, aligning with the definition of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the integration and improvement of AI-powered solutions within existing systems, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner
job_tasks.justification: This describes the goal of ensuring the functionality and user experience of the conversational AI systems, a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling
job_tasks.justification: This directly points to the ongoing development and enhancement of existing software tools and platforms, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the core responsibility of managing and improving existing software solutions, aligning with software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: This task involves designing and implementing a data architecture, which is a core component of data engineering for AI/ML processes.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: This task directly relates to the evaluation and management of LLM interactions, fitting the definition of prompt engineering and RAG.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating classification algorithms falls under the broader scope of model development and testing, even if it's traditional ML.

job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the management and preparation of data for AI/ML models, which is a key aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of a new platform (MS Copilot) and migration of existing systems, a significant software development and integration task.
This phrase indicates the core task of integrating and utilizing LLMs to enhance existing solutions, falling under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of the role within a diverse team.

job_tasks.phrase: In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
job_tasks.justification: This further emphasizes the need for collaboration with various other technical and non-technical roles.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates working within a team with diverse skill sets.

soft_skills.phrase: In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on maintaining and improving existing conversational AI workflows and solutions (e.g., Chatbot Anna, IVR, Advisor Assist), which falls under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). While it mentions tasks related to LLM evaluation pipelines and empowering solutions with LLMs (Macro-Category B), these are framed as improvements to existing software rather than core model development or specialized GenAI research. The role involves integrating and managing AI components within a broader software engineering context, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to maintaining and improving existing AI-powered software solutions. It also mentions specific AI-related tasks like LLM prompt evaluation and data architecture. The language is generally clear, but some tasks like 'implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms' could lean towards traditional ML, and the overall emphasis is more on the engineering and integration of AI into existing systems rather than deep AI model development.
